project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, displaying the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the word reading functionality from the text file
Develop the logic to count the frequency of each word
Create functionality to display the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the reading, counting, and displaying functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
